trans-unit.source: Open Graph
trans-unit.target: Open Graph

trans-unit.source: The title of your object as it should appear within the graph, e.g., "The Rock".
trans-unit.target: The title of your object as it should appear within the graph, e.g., "The Rock".

trans-unit.source: The type of your object, e.g., "website".
trans-unit.target: The type of your object, e.g., "website".

trans-unit.source: A brief description of your object.
trans-unit.target: A brief description of your object.

trans-unit.source: If your object is part of a larger web site, the name which should be displayed for the overall site. e.g., "IMDb".
trans-unit.target: If your object is part of a larger web site, the name which should be displayed for the overall site. e.g., "IMDb".

trans-unit.source: The locale your object is written in.
trans-unit.target: The locale your object is written in.

trans-unit.source: The locality of your object e.g. "Los Angeles".
trans-unit.target: The locality of your object e.g. "Los Angeles".

trans-unit.source: A preview image for your object.
trans-unit.target: A preview image for your object.

trans-unit.source: Move the row up one position
trans-unit.target: Move the row up one position

trans-unit.source: Move the row down one position
trans-unit.target: Move the row down one position

trans-unit.source: Twitter
trans-unit.target: Twitter

trans-unit.source: @username for the website used in the card footer.
trans-unit.target: @username for the website used in the card footer.

trans-unit.source: Type of card, see https://dev.twitter.com/cards/overview for further information.
trans-unit.target: Type of card, see https://dev.twitter.com/cards/overview for further information.

trans-unit.source: A concise title for the related content.
trans-unit.target: A concise title for the related content.

trans-unit.source: A description that concisely summarizes the content as appropriate for presentation within a Tweet. You should not re-use the title as the description or use this field to describe the general services provided by the website.
trans-unit.target: A description that concisely summarizes the content as appropriate for presentation within a Tweet. You should not re-use the title as the description or use this field to describe the general services provided by the website.

trans-unit.source: A preview image for your object.
trans-unit.target: A preview image for your object.
